import React from 'react' import './checkout.styles.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import FormInput from '../../components/form-input/form-input.component' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name) }
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector > ({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
